sources.title: All My Sons (1948)
sources.description: During WWII, industrialist Joe Keller commits a crime and frames his business partner Herbert Deever. Years later, his sin comes back to haunt him when Joe's son plans to marry Deever's daughter. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/all-my-sons-1948/

metadata.Plot: All My Sons tells the story of Joe Keller, a successful, middle-aged, self-made man who has done a terrible and tragic thing. He framed his business partner for a crime and engineered his own exoneration. Now, his son is about to marry the partner's daughter, the affair is revisited, and his lie of a life is unraveled.
metadata.Actors: Edward G. Robinson, Burt Lancaster, Mady Christians
